name: Neutron
description: Duality is a DEX on the Neutron network for secure and efficient crypto trading. It uses smart contracts and offers a user-friendly interface.

name: Astroport
description: Astroport is an AMM(Automated Market Maker)-style decentralized exchange built with CosmWasm smart contracts.

name: Apollo dao
description: Optimize your DeFi yields with smart contracts-automated Apollo Vaults strategies.

name: Drop Money
description: Drop is a DeFi platform focused on providing liquidity across multiple blockchain networks, enhancing interoperability and transaction efficiency.

name: DaoDao Zone
description: Simple, capable, and free DAO toolings for Neutron

name: Coinhall
description: Providing real-time cryptocurrency market data, including prices, trading volumes, and market caps.

name: Hyperlane Nexus
description: Features the L1-L2-L3 architecture and Neutron for quantum resistance and advanced cryptography, aiming to create a secure, efficient decentralized network.

name: NFA Zone
description: The premier Cosmos Meme Coin Factory. Easily buy or create your own token and compete for liquidity to secure a listing on Astroport.

name: Levana
description: Levana Trade is a decentralized platform for trading perpetual swaps with leverage on various crypto assets. It offers a user-friendly interface and tools for managing risk in a transparent, trustless environment.

name: Skip
description: Skip Protocol optimizes blockchain efficiency by enabling secure and transparent block space auctions for MEV. It helps validators and delegators maximize revenue while maintaining network performance.

name: Squid
description: Squid Router enables seamless cross-chain swaps and asset transfers between different blockchain networks. It enhances DeFi accessibility by providing efficient token bridging and interoperability.

name: Eclipsefi
description: A revolutionary hub for interchain token launches, bringing the value back into the hands of early communities.

name: Red Bank
description: Lend, borrow and earn on Red Bank lending platform designed by Mars Protocol team.

name: TFM
description: TFM is a financial technology platform that offers a range of financial products and services.
